medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient had a hepatic mass detected by CT at another clinic. At 5 months post-operation, he complained of right flank pain, and CT showed a new mass in the right adrenal gland. After 6.5 months post-operation, the adrenal mass disappeared, but recurred masses were noted on the posterior aspect of the right kidney and both lungs. Additional recurred masses developed in the liver, lung, and brain over time.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient had a history of alcohol consumption, drinking about 36 g of alcohol per week for 40 years.
